english_example_sentence: If you had walked carefully on that old path, you would have found a beautiful mushroom.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты осторожно шел по той старой тропинке, ты бы нашел красивый гриб.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen o eski patikada dikkatli yürüseydin, güzel bir mantar bulurdun.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen o eski patikada dikkatli ______, güzel bir mantar bulurdun.
